original_text: The king went across the river to Gilgal. Kimham went with him. All Judah's army and half of Israel's soldiers helped the king to cross the river.
korean_text: 왕이 길갈로 건너오고 김함도 함께 건너오니 온 유다 백성과 이스라엘 백성의 절반이나 왕과 함께 건너니라

sentences.original_text: The king went across the river to Gilgal.
All Judah's army helped the king
and half of Israel's soldiers helped the king to cross the river.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 군사의 절반도 강을 건너는 것을 도왔습니다.
